Literature.Title: Semi-synthetic puwainaphycin/minutissamide cyclic lipopeptides with improved antifungal activity and limited cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Hájek J, Bieringer S, Voráčová K, Macho M, Saurav K, Delawská K, Divoká P, Fišer R, Mikušová G, Cheel J, Fewer DP, Vu DL, Paichlová J, Riepl H, Hrouzek P

Literature.Title: Minutissamides A-D, antiproliferative cyclic decapeptides from the cultured cyanobacterium Anabaena minutissima
Literature.Author: Kang HS, Krunic A, Shen Q, Swanson SM, Orjala J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus fumigatus BCC020_2845(MIC=37.5µM),Fusarium oxysporum BCC020_2866(no activity data),Trichoderma harzianum BCC020_0606(no activity data),Bipolaris sorokiniana BCC020_1571(no activity data),Plectosphaerella cucumerina BCC020_2872(no activity data),Chaetomium globosum BCC020_2527(no activity data),Candida friedrichii BCC020_2879(no activity data),Alternaria alternata BCC020_0609(MIC=75µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=2.8µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HT29(IC50=2.0µM)
